remarks: Version of ~ cbvald with a dv condition, which does not require ~ ax-13 .  (Contributed by BJ, 16-Jun-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
bj-cbvaldv.1 $e |- F/ y ph $.
bj-cbvaldv.2 $e |- ( ph -> F/ y ps ) $.
bj-cbvaldv.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( x = y -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) ) $.
bj-cbvaldv $p |- ( ph -> ( A. x ps <-> A. y ch ) ) $.
$d ch x $.
$d ph x $.
$d x y $.
